text: Amal and George Clooney have become proud parents to twins this week. And as the news was made public on Tuesday afternoon, the human rights lawyer's mother Baria Alamuddin was spotted shopping in London, no doubt buying some gifts for new arrivals Ella and Alexander. Baria, 66, looked effortlessly chic in a casual and comfortable ensemble, teaming a loose white blouse with smart trousers. Scroll down for video Baby joy!
